texts.biography: Marie of Romania (Marie Alexandra Victoria, previously Princess Marie of Edinburgh; 29 October 1875 â€“ 18 July 1938) was Queen consort of Romania from 1914 to 1927, as the wife of Ferdinand of Romania.
